verses.verse: Now the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto Yonah <S%H3124><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amittai <S%H573><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to Ninveh <S%H5210><s%>, that great <S%H1419><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>, and cry <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8798><s%> against it; for their wickedness <S%H7451><s%> is come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.

But Yonah <S%H3124><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to flee <S%H1272><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Yafo <S%H3305><s%>; and he found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a ship <S%H591><s%> going <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to Tarshish <S%H8659><s%>: so he paid <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the fare <S%H7939><s%> thereof, and went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into it, to go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> with them unto Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

But the YY <S%H3068><s%> sent out <S%H2904><s%> <S%H8689><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and there was a mighty <S%H1419><s%> tempest <S%H5591><s%> in the sea <S%H3220><s%>, so that the ship <S%H591><s%> was like <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to be broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8736><s%>.

Then the mariners <S%H4419><s%> were afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and cried <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto his god <S%H430><s%>, and cast forth <S%H2904><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the wares <S%H3627><s%> that were in the ship <S%H591><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%>, to lighten <S%H7043><s%> <S%H8687><s%> it of them. But Yonah <S%H3124><s%> was gone down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into the sides <S%H3411><s%> of the ship <S%H5600><s%>; and he lay <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and was fast asleep <S%H7290><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

So the shipmaster <S%H7227><s%> <S%H2259><s%> came <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to him, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, What meanest thou, O sleeper <S%H7290><s%> <S%H8737><s%>? arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8798><s%> upon thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, if so be that 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> will think <S%H6245><s%> <S%H8691><s%> upon us, that we perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not.

And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> to his fellow <S%H7453><s%>, Come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and let us cast <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8686><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%>, that we may know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for whose cause <S%H7945><s%> this evil <S%H7451><s%> is upon us. So they cast <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8686><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%>, and the lot <S%H1486><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon Yonah <S%H3124><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> they unto him, Tell <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8685><s%> us, we pray thee, for whose cause this evil <S%H7451><s%> is upon us; What is thine occupation <S%H4399><s%>? and whence <S%H370><s%> comest <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thou? what is thy country <S%H776><s%>? and of what people <S%H5971><s%> art thou?

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, I am an Hebrew <S%H5680><s%>; and I fear <S%H3373><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, which hath made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> and the dry <S%H3004><s%> land.

Then were the men <S%H582><s%> exceedingly <S%H1419><s%> <S%H3374><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Why hast thou done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this? For the men <S%H582><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that he fled <S%H1272><s%> <S%H8802><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, because he had told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> they unto him, What shall we do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee, that the sea <S%H3220><s%> may be calm <S%H8367><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto us? for the sea <S%H3220><s%> wrought <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and was tempestuous <S%H5590><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Take me up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and cast me forth <S%H2904><s%> <S%H8685><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%>; so shall the sea <S%H3220><s%> be calm <S%H8367><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto you: for I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8802><s%> that for my sake <S%H7945><s%> this great <S%H1419><s%> tempest <S%H5591><s%> is upon you.

Nevertheless the men <S%H582><s%> rowed hard <S%H2864><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to bring <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8687><s%> it to the land <S%H3004><s%>; but they could <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not: for the sea <S%H3220><s%> wrought <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and was tempestuous <S%H5590><s%> <S%H8802><s%> against them.

Wherefore they cried <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, We beseech thee <S%H577><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, we beseech thee, let us not perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for this man's <S%H376><s%> life <S%H5315><s%>, and lay <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not upon us innocent <S%H5355><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>: for thou, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, hast done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> as it pleased <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee.

So they took up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yonah <S%H3124><s%>, and cast him forth <S%H2904><s%> <S%H8686><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%>: and the sea <S%H3220><s%> ceased <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from her raging <S%H2197><s%>.

Then the men <S%H582><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> exceedingly <S%H1419><s%> <S%H3374><s%>, and offered <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and made <S%H5087><s%> <S%H8799><s%> vows <S%H5088><s%>.

Now the YY <S%H3068><s%> had prepared <S%H4487><s%> <S%H8762><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> fish <S%H1709><s%> to swallow up <S%H1104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Yonah <S%H3124><s%>. And Yonah <S%H3124><s%> was in the belly <S%H4578><s%> of the fish <S%H1709><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%>.
